patthana21.28:1.1: Nahetuṃ naparittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.28:2.1: Nahetuṃ namahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.28:3.1: Nahetuṃ naappamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
